data.quote: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: The saddest aspect of life right now is that science gathers knowledge faster than society gathers wisdom.
data.author: Isaac Asimov

data.quote: Never memorize something that you can look up.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
data.author: Carl Sagan

data.quote: Time is a drug. Too much of it kills you.
data.author: Terry Pratchett

data.quote: I'm sure the universe is full of intelligent life. It's just been too intelligent to come here.
data.author: Arthur Clarke

data.quote: If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants.
data.author: Isaac Newton
